text: Edward kingc gret Eadnoþ biscop & Beorn eorl & alle mine þegnes on Hertfordscire frendlice.

& ic cyþe eow þat ic habbe gegifen Criste & Sancte Petre into Westmenstre þa land Deceswrþe & Wattune mid sace & mid socne, mid tolle & mid teame & mid infangeneþeofe swa full & swa forð swa Alwunn si nunne hit heold of þam minstre & <atforen> Ædiðe þaire hlafdie Æeadwine abbyde & þam monecan up hyo betehte & al swa Æadgar cingc <in> to þam minstre hyo geuuþe & eac alswa swa hyo gedemde waron on þam nigon sciran on Wendelbury.
